scripts.develop: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=plugins npx tiddlywiki editions/develop --verbose --server 55505 $:/core/save/all text/plain text/html
scripts.develop-codemirror: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=plugins npx tiddlywiki editions/develop-codemirror --verbose --server 55505 $:/core/save/all text/plain text/html
scripts.release: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=plugins npx tiddlywiki editions/release --verbose --output . --build release
scripts.release:library: cross-env TIDDLYWIKI_PLUGIN_PATH=plugins npx tiddlywiki editions/release --verbose --output . --build library
